content: cute decoration for a child s room this lovely little wandering star decoration works up really quickly it uses super chunky yarn for that instant satisfaction feeling and looks so soft and squishy everyone will want one materials 7mm hook approximately 25g super chunky chenille yarn i used hobbii honey bunny yarn in colour gold dust 27 5g stuffing- i used polyester hi loft toy stuffing yarn needle 4 stitch markers size 17cm x 17cm 7 x 7 inches *instant download pattern* this listing is for a pdf crochet pattern only uk and us terminology and not the finished item this pattern is available for free on my website- https //melucrochet com/2022/11/27/wandering-star-by-melu-crochet/ thanks for looking for more inspiration follow me on etsy melucrochet etsy com love crafts melu crochet facebook https //www facebook com/melucrochet pinterest https //www pinterest co uk/melucrochet/ instagram https //www instagram com/melucrochet/ ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/melucrochet payhip https //payhip com/melucrochet hobbii https //hobbii co uk/product-patterns filter=designer%3am website and blog melucrochet com follow my blog melucrochet com and take a look at how my testers got on
